Description: Rim sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: glazed black on rim; narrow fine reserved line; glazed black below; inscription on exterior; slightly out-turned rim
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1574)
